Posts.Content: SandyBeaches wrote: Had a bilateral mastectomy w/ immediate TE on 2/14/12.  It appears I developed a rash near the incision site on the right one and also on the skin where the bottom of both expanders meet the skin above my stomach area (if his makes sense).  No sign of infection though.  Curious to know if this has happened to anyone?  The skin above my stomach itches like crazy since I have feeling in this area.    Dx 11/2011, DCIS, 0/1 nodes Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Rash near incision site? SandyBeaches Cats134
